title: Incorporate Customer_Analyzer fit score/segment/positioning blocks into initiation guidance generation

sections.text: Update the initiation guidance generator to consume the newly exposed Customer_Analyzer context (fit score, segment, approved positioning blocks) when producing recommended outreach messaging. Ensure the generator deterministically selects which positioning blocks to reference (e.g., top N approved blocks) and gracefully falls back to the existing initiation flow when data is missing or stale. Add a small set of unit/fixture tests to confirm the Customer_Analyzer fields are reflected in the generated initiation guidance.
